name: Undercon-troll
description:
Pappu is severely addicted, he needs his daily dose.

Pappu drinks it to increase his speed but sometimes loses his self-control. 

The bottle has a positive as well as negative side.

You have to help him cross these busy roads to get to his favorite store.

Controls : 

WASD = to walk in that direction 

This game was made for the 2021 community jam.

This was our first ever jam. Currently There are only 3 levels but with enough playtime.
